website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice for easing cold and flu symptoms. Comes with 70 gummies rather than 60.
pros: Buyers report that these gummies work well for those susceptible to colds
If you do get a cold, they may ease symptoms for some consumers
cons: The sugar-coated gummies are too sweet for some

customer_reviews.title: Good choice at $11
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these vitamins. Great taste, packed with all good stuff I was looking for in a vitamin for the flu season. Good value for $10.97 the sale price for the previous bottle. Unfortunately 3 weeks after my first purchase price jumped to $30😱 A little excessive considering nothing changed when it comes to the product.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Figurski

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I was using Zarbees and I switched brands. I love these just as much if not more. There are more gummies per bottle so each bottle lasts much longer. I give them to my daughter everyday to help keep her from catching everything that goes around in school. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old approved
customer_reviews.text: They taste great and are so much easier and less messy than trying to get my toddler to drink Elderberry syrup! He loves them! I can't say if they "work", but we both took them throughout flu season and didn't have so much as a sniffle
customer_reviews.author: Kerstin Walling

customer_reviews.title: Price Gouging
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed these tasty gummies and the price of $15.00 I thought was reasonable. The first time I purchased these were on March 12, 2020 and I only bought 1 bottle and since they were so good I decided to buy another bottle for next month. So, 5 days later I decided to order another bottle but this time the had increased 50%, in 5 days the price went from $15.99 to $29.99. I placed by order but couldn't bring myself to be a victim to price gouging so I canceled the order. To think a company would take advantage of people during this covid-19 pandemic is a hard pill to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Rush

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: We use these for the kids and my 5 yr old loves them my 18 month old (we cut them into smaller pieces with scissors) is not a fan of the taste but still takes them. Definitely get the most gummies with the most elderberry per gummy for your money with these!
customer_reviews.author: Cah13

customer_reviews.title: Very yummy loved by the whole family
customer_reviews.text: With the cold weather upon us for the winter months and all the germs floating on the air I want it to give my family a heads-up on building their immune systems. I don't have time to make my own Elderberry syrup and not all of my children will take syrup. Finding this and gummy format has been a peace of mind on top of these are very delicious. The gummy is not too chewy and dissolves fairly quickly and does not leave a lingering taste. We are already on our second bottle for a family of four within a one-month time. This is one vitamin that does not stay sitting on the shelf unused.
customer_reviews.author: Ange

customer_reviews.title: Nipped the bug in the bud
customer_reviews.text: These gummies taste great, as seem to be helping to boost my immune system. I usually catch a cold or the flu - some virus or another - a couple of times each winter. Knock on wood AND keep eating the Elderberry gummies, I haven't been sick since starting with this Elderberry supplement. In fact, I was a couple of days into a slight bought of something or another (sore throat, itchy eyes and achy body) when I ordered these, and they nipped that bug in the bud. I was pretty thrilled, and have become a true believer in the power of elderberry (and the propolis and echinacea are frosting on the cake).
customer_reviews.author: Shellybomb

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for over 2 years and really feel they have improved my immune system. When I feel a cold coming on I double up on my dosage. I was disappointed when I went to reorder during COVID-19 and the price was more than doubled. The price has come down since then, but still not the same as before the virus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: shame on you!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the vitamins, good taste, great ingrdient mix, one tiny detail.... bought them before all this covid mayhem... at $10 bucks, now they cost $29.99, made me really mad, what a way to take advantage of the buyer amid this health crisis knowing everyone is buyng vitamins to protect their immune system....
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.D. -Guala!-

customer_reviews.title: Take it to help immune system
customer_reviews.text: Excellent to get you well fast. Elderberry is an amazing supplement to help your immune system get stronger especially during the months people get sick a lot. Take it at the first sign of sniffles or coughs and it usually gets rid of the issue in no time. Serving is two so taking one in the morning and night should do well. The flavor is sweet like a candy so it doesn’t have that bitter taste many of these supplements do.
customer_reviews.author: Honest consumer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t help anyone in the family
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t suggest this brand. We are a vitamin taking, oil using family. I added these gummies to our preventative health plan and we’ve all been sick almost nonstop since taking get these. We’ve gone through several bottles as a family and I’m convinced these are doing nothing. There are so many elderberry options on amazon, I’m going to try something else before writing off elderberry completely, but I just don’t think these work. Two adults and a two year old took them daily for 2 months along w our other supplements and they have done nothing to help us. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Price gouging is not ok
customer_reviews.text: We liked this product but do not find doubling the price acceptable in time of crisis
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Missing part of the bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I opened these and noticed it looked less than 60, after counting I found out there was only 43 inside the bottle! I must have gotten a returned bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Of course my expectation was exactly what was advertised but they don't tell you all the ingredients as soon as I got this product I was very disappointed to find out that its got corn syrup in it!?!? are you kidding me and they don't advertise that! that alone disqualifies this as being a health product...
customer_reviews.author: James Brown

customer_reviews.title: Price gouging
customer_reviews.text: I paid $10.99 for this product 3 times and just last month. Now with the coronavirus the are gonna price gouge and raise it up to $29.99 Terrible
customer_reviews.author: mark DB

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste !
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using the Elderberry Gummies for a few weeks now, but this is something I intend to continue using! The taste is so good, usually if it's good foe you, it has to taste bad. I am 62 years old and was frequently sick from one thing or the other. Since beginning these, No Sickness at all. All my family and friends keep asking what have I changed. When I tell them, they are all surprised. Everyone of them wanted to know where to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: stay healthy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for me and my husband, keeps us from getting colds and the flu. We both work in the healthcare field, I am a nurse and he works EMS, we are both in contact with ill people as part of our occupations. We love this stuff, keeps us from having to get sick and call out of work. Tastes great and the price is right. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Storm

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have found this All in one product .
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was taking 3 different products Elderberry Supplement, Vitamin C, and sometimes Echinacea. Now I can take just this. I also did a little research on Propolis and was pleased with the findings. I have been using this for almost a month and have been around and caring for my grandchildren with colds, coughing and stomach issues and I did not get sick. I plan to continue taking this. Happy to have found this product.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: okay so far
customer_reviews.text: Of all the belive gummies I’ve had I was expecting this to have the best flavor because the ingredients are actual fruit derivatives, but there’s a vague aftertaste that’s not the greatest (tastes healthy for lack of a better word). Still I prefer this to the vitamin c pills I used to take and the synergistic ingredients are a bonus. I need my immune system to be strong now more than ever because I’m high risk for covid and it looks like this virus is going to stay unmanaged for a while. I’ve only been taking these for a few days so I’ll update my review once I’ve gotten through most/all of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Aly M

customer_reviews.title: best elderberry/echinacea immune support gummies
customer_reviews.text: I compared a lot of elderberry gummies and pills before settling on these for immune support. First off they have the highest dose of elderberry per gummy I saw (100 mg per chew compared to as low as 25 mg per chew for other brands). Second, they also have echinacea, vitamin C and propolis for immune support. Lastly, they taste absolutely delightful! If I had to be super picky, I would say I wish they also had zinc and were slightly small for travel, but otherwise they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Anon.

customer_reviews.title: Best Elderberry supplement- LIFE CHANGING
customer_reviews.text: My kids were sick more than 3/4 of the time before I started buying these. This has boosted their immune system so significantly, I will NEVER run out! If they start getting a runny nose, I just up the dose and give them 2 gummies 2 times per day and they fight it off so much faster and without steroids or breathing treatments! A complete lifechanger for us! We had tried 3 other brands, this one is BY FAR the most effective and superior!
customer_reviews.author: Mumof2

customer_reviews.title: Caused Gas
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other brands of Elderberry Gummies and wanted to try something new but for some reason something in these these gave me gas. I tried them several days and even every other day to make sure it wasn’t something I ate. Also, I didn’t find the flavor or texture of these as good as the Havasu brand.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: To everyone....
customer_reviews.text: All, those who are ordering these things just to have them STOP. Save them for people who need them in our current times! I've been on them for months. Why? Liver cancer treatment, Addison disease, recovering from Pulmonary Embolism, heart trouble, diabetise, leg amputation, and possible M.S. Now I can't get them. I have a 15yo daughter, a 13yo son and a wife I need to stay alive for. A simple common cold can kill me. SO STOP BEING SELFISH AND SAVE THIS KIND OF STUFF FOR THOSE WHO NEED IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: You are now paying 3x for the same product before the pandemic.
customer_reviews.text: Way to blow up the price 250% during a pandemic. Just WHY??
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my 3 toddlers are sick very often. They have asthma and allergies. I dont know if it is the product but since I started supplemmenting with these gummies, and another product, I noticed their immune system is stronger. They got entherovirus and the symptoms were very mild. Their asthma symptoms are better too. My mom, who takes care of them sometimes, also noticed it. The flavor is very good and it was one of the few products that contained both echinacea and elderberry
customer_reviews.author: Giselle Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great Gummies, Saved me in a Pinch
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I like to keep them in the house at all times. Elderberry really works and fighting cold and flu duration. I was hoping I wouldn't need them right away. My mom came back from Greece with a horrible cold she got on the way home from the airplane, and she was miserable. I sent these home with her, and within a day her symptoms lessened! I will never be without, and I love that these have added "extras"!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Caballero

customer_reviews.title: Elderberry is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Our family all dread the winter bugs and this year we decided to add this to our immune boosting line up. We love these gummies, and the kids give them a thumbs up! The flavor is great!
customer_reviews.author: A. VanWagenen

customer_reviews.title: Great value !
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old gets sick often with being in school and surrounded by a bunch of sick kids. Wanted to give her something everyday that is safe for her and more natural that can help boost her immune system instead of her always going to the doctor and getting put on medicine. Seems to be helping a bit, but havnt been on them long to see the full results. But, so far so good! She loves the taste and asks for her vitamins every morning with her breakfast! I would definitely recommend and I just bought 2 more bottles to stock up =]
customer_reviews.author: Kayla A.

customer_reviews.title: Price Gouging
customer_reviews.text: I loved this gummy. I bought three for less than $10/each a little over a month ago. Now they are $29.99. I went on the Belive website and they are $29.99 there too. Total price gouging. There is no way I can buy these at this inflated price. It's ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Don't love flavor, and the gummies stick together
customer_reviews.text: I've used three other elderberry products (syrup & gummies) and liked them all. These aren't horrible, but I won't be using them again. First, the flavor isn't as good as others we've tried. I don't know if it's the artificial flavor (I usually like raspberry), the added propolis and echinacea, or what, but my family just didn't like the flavor. Second, although the gummies arrived clump-free, within a week, the gummies began sticking together. They are now fully stuck, and the only way to get them out is to use a spoon or something to dig a couple of gummies out of the bottle. Too much hassle, not yummy enough to be worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: MMom

customer_reviews.title: Family approved...Update in price gouging
customer_reviews.text: I am leaving my original review but I am truly disappointed in this company. As if January 18 I paid $13.99 not on sale . I had consistently paid that before the Covid-19 outbreak. To see that they are saying the original price is $25.99 is a lie. How disappointing. My whole family takes them. My girls 4&7 love the flavor and texture. We tried sambucol but they did not like the flavor. The year before we took them we were sick a lot. Since we've started I would have to say we are a lot healthier throughout the year.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Immune disorder & sick free for 4 months!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these gummies for 4 months now. So has my family - my two parents in their 50s, and my partner who is in his late 20’s and I’m in my early 30’s. I have two auto immune disorders. Prior to these gummies, I’d be sick at least once a month. I haven’t been sick within the 4 months of taking. And my family has stayed healthy, and sick-free, too. I am prone to sinus infections, and haven’t had a single one all throughout spring seasons... I will continue to religiously buy and take these gummies.
customer_reviews.author: kimberlea wimmer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these for a few months and so far have not caught any of the colds which my children and grandchildren have shared amongst themselves. Chewy and tastes great. Not hard to chew. Edit March 2019: I ran out of these and missed maybe a week or so of them. During that time I caught my first cold all winter. I won't be running out again!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting and packed with the best immunity boosters!
customer_reviews.text: My whole family (including my very picky 5yo) all take this. The flavor is great! Perfect for this coming cold season. I took it as soon as I felt some scratchy throat like I was about to come down with something and I felt a huge difference by day 2. My husband travels a lot for work and my son is in Kindergarten, so they are exposed to so many germs. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Z1Z2

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessarily sweetened with corn syrup!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to order this Elderberry Gummies with Propolis and Echinacea immune system booster, until yesterday that l opened the package and tasted how sweet these are! I missed to look at the ingredients before placing the order. To discover now that it contains Glucose Syrup(Corn Syrup)! That really disappointed me, because that’s an ingredient most people worrying about healthy nutrition now-days avoid. These are really unnecessarily sweet... and that’s the reason l’m only giving 3 stars to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alba S. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them in March and found them to be very tasty. So far I did not get any colds. I wanted to keep my immune system up because I work in a hospital. I was taking care of covid19 pt and I am happy to say I have tested negative for covid19, did this help I am not sure but am glad I took them.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great gummies, but gives me a tummy ache
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste and texture of these elderberry gummies. My kids love them. My tummy, however, does not. I don't think it is the product. I think I am just one of those people who is sensitive to elderberry. If you get a tummy ache after eating these, you might just be sensitive to them. The product itself is great. Immune boost!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L

customer_reviews.title: PRICE GOUGING !!!!
customer_reviews.text: A nice supplement as winter & flu season is here. They are a nice soft gummy - NOT the sticky chewy kind & I really like that! Includes Vit. C & Echinacea! On our 2nd bottle! Update 1/18 - our 4th bottle & VERY happy with product! UPDATE 3/25/20 - My last 6 bottles were under $15.00. Now you're listing at $28.49 !!!! AWFUL!! You've lost me as a result of your irresponsible practice.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Martelli

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be working great!
customer_reviews.text: Been taking them for a month now. I honestly think that they are helping keep me from getting sick. Everyone around me keeps getting colds and I still haven’t even gotten as much as a snuffy nose. Haven’t changed anything else in my diet other than adding these. I’ve even added them to my monthly subscription now.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L.

customer_reviews.title: By my bedside this winter!
customer_reviews.text: I keep these on my nightstand so I remember to take one in the morning and one at night this winter. I have no research or scientific studies to support if they work or not, but they taste great and when everyone else in the house was coming down with cold and sore throat symptoms I did catch what was going around. As far as I'm concerned even if it's a placebo effect it's working for me! :)
customer_reviews.author: Karma

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I take 2 gummies daily. It tastes delicious and has helped build our immune systems up over the past year. I had bought a bunch of different elderberry gummies prior and this one seems to be the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this brand at all
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. They are supposed to raspberry flavored but Im not sure about that. I figured Vitmun C and Elderberry in one product is a good deal at a time like this but Im just not really happy with the product. Over all I am taking them with many other vitamins soo I cannot tell how well it works but im not happy with the taste or this brand of vitamin gummies at all.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good gummies but don’t like the fluctuating price
customer_reviews.text: I like these gummies. I give them to my 4 year old. It seems to keep his immune system healthy. My only issue is that I signed up for subscribe and save and then without knowing they raised the price of the gummies by like $5 which kind of negates the whole idea of subscribe and save. I have noticed this about all my subscribe and save products. They all raised in prices and I feel like this is unfair because you sign up for a certain price and then they raise the prices on you. Doesn’t make much sense. Other than that I like these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin c support gummies using to change up with standard c use
customer_reviews.text: Tried them and liked them. Seems there is a delivery mix up for this current order which happens very rarely, like mythological but occasional. We were home, driveway was open and saw our delivery person and received other mail. If product is returned by mail system, not for lack of being here. Great product experience before so give it a go if you like.
customer_reviews.author: tigerina

customer_reviews.title: 5-star!!
customer_reviews.text: I’d been taking this for the past couple months and didn’t get sick even though my son got sick a couple times. It wasn’t until I ran out I got sick about 2 days later. The flavor is really good but I wish it wasn’t as sweet as it is. All in all it’s really helped keep me well since I’ve taken it. I have it set up on subscribe&save so hopefully I never run out again
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. After hearing and reading amazing reviews on these gummies, this bottle arrived with condensation inside (seal still in tact) all the gummies wet/ stuck together ... will reorder and hope that it is just this one bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, Vegan gummy!
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute favorite elderberry gummies! Love the added echinacea and my little one loves the flavor so they are easy to Give to her. It was important for us to find a vegan gummy and a clean gummy! This is it for us
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Corona

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: My girls love these. We have tried tons of vitamins over the years, and syrups and these are by far the best tasting. I'm a nutritional fact reader and these are better then any other I've reviewed and tried. I find us much healthier on them then years past when we didn't use elderberry.
customer_reviews.author: steve o

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting and effective gummies!
customer_reviews.text: These are seriously the best immune support gummies out there! I have taken elderberry syrup in the past, but I cannot get my daughter to take it. These taste great, and my daughter loves them. I have to remind her she can only have 2! We both already had head colds when we started taking them and we both started feeling better the next day. Now we take them daily as a preventive measure! Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaAnn

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without these?
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins have changed my life! After my son started kindergarten last year he brought home every bug imaginable and I was sick for months on end. A friend recommended these and I joke, I haven’t been sick once this flu season. My immunity is stronger than ever and I take them every day. My kids take them too. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith P

customer_reviews.title: Tastefully
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the up coming cold and flu season to help keep my immune system strong, I really like these gummies, they dont stick to your teeth and they dont leave an unfavorable after taste, actually they taste kind of fruity, overall i recommend this product for a little extra boost for the season.
customer_reviews.author: Monie

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I have ordered practically every elderberry gummy out there and they're all pretty good. But this one is the best. The flavor and texture are on point and I love the ingredients and adding the propolis. I moved these to my subscribe and save bc I love them. I don't always leave reviews due to time etc. but I had to share
customer_reviews.author: Rachel N. Jonas

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, switched from another brand
customer_reviews.text: We had been buying Zarbee's for a couple of years but when paired with my son's vitamins, we ended up with too many of certain ingredients. Not a huge proponent of gummy vits since I know their efficacy is mediocre but, these get some of the stuff into his system (and mine) and he likes the flavor. He stays pretty healthy but these give me that little extra boost of confidence in keeping him that way!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Groschup

customer_reviews.title: I don't like elderberry
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 1 star only because I didn't know I didn't like elderberry.I'm sure it's a fine product,its just not to my taste.Gave it to a friend an they like it.
customer_reviews.author: FOG

customer_reviews.title: Heartburn fiesta
customer_reviews.text: gives terrible heartburn. Had to return it; couldn’t take it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Perugini

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Horrible taste and texture Definitely not for children. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy D Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using the elderberry product for 2 years now and have not gotten sick. My husband is the only one who doesn't take them in the house, and he us the one who does get sick, so I know they work! The flavor is fantastic. My son and I both love them and take them religiously year round. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joann Reposa

customer_reviews.title: Best by far
customer_reviews.text: We have tried many brands and these have by far been the best flavor, easiest to get my kids to take, and the highest elderberry content.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: These gummies are amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: My son started kindergarten this past year and it was his first year in school so he was sick more days than he was well. After endless runny noses and having a bad stomach virus for almost a week to having bacterial pneumonia a week after recovering from the stomach virus, I was at my wits end and purchased these gummies. Not only did he love the flavor, the time between him getting sick were spread out over longer periods. I stand by these in that they definitely boost the immune system. I’d recommend to everybody but especially for kids who like sour gummies..... they will love them and it’ll help boost the immune system.
customer_reviews.author: annatasha

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few elderberry gummies and none taste as good as this one! The most important part is that it's a soft gummy, not those types that are super hard to chew and stick to your teeth. I love that it also incorporates echinacea and bee propolis, which boosts the immune system. And my toddler loves them too!
customer_reviews.author: SpicyShrimp

customer_reviews.title: Weird taste/texture but effective
customer_reviews.text: These taste real weird y'all. I feel like I'm eating fish or an octopus and the texture is not what I was expecting. I have tried 3 different brands/kinds of gummie elderberries and these were definitely the strangest. As far as the benefits go I do believe they work just as well as the others if you can get oast the funky taste and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Great chewable and works!!
customer_reviews.text: I am the only one in my family who was not sick this year. I was exposed so many times to sick kids and parents, was on airplanes multiple times. They had fevers, productive coughs and yucky noses. During the acute phases, I actually doubled up, and managed to stay well all winter. Highly recommend and am on my 7th bottle this year
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love the Taste!!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been ordering these for awhile and the kids LOVE the flavor. We’ve run out in the past and have ordered different brands of elderberry vitamins, but our kids would not eat them. I think most elderberry vitamins have a good taste, but kids can be a little picky. I also love that it has propolis & echinacea in addition to the elderberry! Good flavor and so far we are staying healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting, great ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I've used elderberry syrup but wanted something faster and less messy (and with less sugar) to get the immunity building power of elderberries. These were recommended by a friend, and I love the taste, ease of taking them and extra protection during cold and flu season. I've made these a regular part of my morning routine.
customer_reviews.author: A reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and so effective!
customer_reviews.text: We love these Elderberry gummies. We have tried other brands and the flavor is just not as great! Anytime we feel the first symptom of illness, we start taking these and our illness either never develops into anything or it is very mild and short lived. I can not recommend these enough!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Raines

customer_reviews.title: We Survived the Flu
customer_reviews.text: It was touch-and-go for a while, but the family pulled through thanks entirely to these gummies... and Western medicine.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: High Elderberry Content Plus More
customer_reviews.text: The 100 mg (200 per daily dose of two gummies) elderberry is among the highest of any elderberry brand already but this also includes echinacea plus bee propolis (a natural virus fighter). Add in the delicious flavor and I was ready to subscribe to regular delivery of this. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Boost immune system
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to boost immune system to my family. My preschooler were getting sick often and goes to whole family. We had a Disney trip coming up and needed extra support not to get sick. We took whole month ad we didn’t my get sick. I will call it success.
customer_reviews.author: Hirokoppe

customer_reviews.title: Still on the fence
customer_reviews.text: The product shipped fast and was what I expected. They taste good and aren't real chewy. Don't get stuck in your teeth. As far as helping ward off sickness, not sure. Got a real bad cold that turned into bronchitis at the moment. Haven't been taking these very long though and I have a weak immune system due to meds, so....
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Finally one my son will actually eat!
customer_reviews.text: These are the ONLY Elderberry gummies my son will take. The flavor is great. We just moved and haven't been able to take them for a week or so because they are packed in a box and now my son has a cold... I'll be on the hunt for that box asap! I will keep a stock of these especially throughout the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa I. Schofield

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste, Great Value, Important Added Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of these elderberry gummies, I've had others that were barely palatable. I also love that Vitamin C, Propolis, and Echinacea are added, as these are also very important for our immune systems. This product contains 70 gummies, most brands are 60 or 30, so in addition to the very competitive price, these are a bargain! I have tried many elderberry gummy products and this is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy Chic

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Taste and Work Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical I would even like the flavor. I'm very picky when it comes to gummy anything! These went above what I imagined!! They taste amazing and I wish I could eat more than two at a time. They are as equally as amazing when it comes to the benefits. Usually when Winter comes I am constantly sick. I started to get a cold and kicked it's butt with no real bad symptoms in no time. I will definitely be contiunint to take these every day as long as they make them!
customer_reviews.author: LConti

customer_reviews.title: So far we love them
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like these. They taste good and my kids will take them. I love that it's an affordable supplement because as most of you know they can get ridiculous. I also like that these have vitamin C and echinacea. Has not been long enough for me to say if its helping keep everyone from getting sick
customer_reviews.author: McKenzy Gallup

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These taste so good they're like candy. The raspberry flavor is a joke, but they taste amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Dobosz

customer_reviews.title: Awful taste
customer_reviews.text: We are not new to elderberry but decided to try a new brand. No one will take them because they taste horrible 🙈. Back to the other brands
customer_reviews.author: jeremy strong

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: These tasted awful! I had to hold my breath just to eat them and quickly swallow them because I wasnt gonna let my money go to waste
customer_reviews.author: Bethany vincent

customer_reviews.title: Tastes greaf
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been trying out all types of elderberry for my 3 children. The syrup and gummies. This is finally something they all love. I tried the gummies too and they taste great. They aren’t super chewy so I even feel comfortable with my youngest eating them who is 20 months old. She does have a ton of teeth too though.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Finger poked through seal and tampered with!
customer_reviews.text: These should have been great! I was really looking forward to this brand. Good price good ingredients expect for the finger sized hole poking through the paper seal!!! It looked deliberate and obviously tampered with. I saw a couple other reviews with opened or damaged seals as well then.. Someone needs to do a better job on quality control. I won't be buying again. Such a shame
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Greiner

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I use this product if I have been around anyone with a cold to boost my immune system as well as at the first sign of cold or flu. Seems to work for me, in combination with other smart habits of course.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeGirl76

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sick yet!
customer_reviews.text: These elderberry gummies are good, I chose these because they are vegan. So far 1/2 of my co-workers have been sick, we use the same phones, keyboards and everything else. I haven't caught whatever is going around..win! They taste good too! Last year I was sick often, this year not at all yet! Happy with this product and will order again soon!
customer_reviews.author: Diane L.

customer_reviews.title: My kid's  favorite elderberry gummys!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I take elderberry every single day! None of us get sick and if we come into contact with a sick person, the furthest it gets is a little runny nose. I swear by elderberry to keep you healthy, plus paired with vitamin C, echinacea, and propolis! Customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: FlexQueen

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat’em!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend these to everyone I know! EVERYONE!! I am thrilled with this product and I have ordered it multiple times which is rare for me. I usually like to try new brands but not this time. Add to cart! You won’t regret it! And the price is incredible for the quality. Happy flu and cold season!!
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty effective
customer_reviews.text: I decided to switch over to this brand of elderberry vitamins based on the reviews for my children. They’ve only been taking them a few days so I hope this stands up to all the hype and most importantly keeps their colds at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Dai

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money! I take these as well as my 5 and 8 year old and they love the taste, take 2 everyday. Good way to get vitamin c also in 2 chewy stars. I subscribe and save with this product and have been using for 3 months or so.
customer_reviews.author: Target Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Very yummy. Taste like candy. I would buy again but the price doubled so I didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and 6yr old approved
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 6yr old son who has an autoimmune disease and is currently on immunosuppressant and myself, so we could stay on top of our health this flu season. They are sweet and not hard, easy to chew and my son thought they were a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Works for compromised immune system!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old has a compromised immune system and we have been trying to find an effective immune booster. I bought these initially for my kids but a couple days after receiving this order, I came down with a cold. I took 2 of these and within 24 hours, I felt immensely better. I believed before that elderberry would help with immune boosting but until I actually saw and felt the results myself, I did not put as much faith in it as I should. Also, the taste is so good! My kids think they're just getting gummy candy. We will definitely keep this company in mind for future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help fight the cooties that always come home from preschool. My kiddo thinks they are delicious, and unlike elderberry syrups, there's no mess with these. I took off one star because I'm not entirely sure we're seeing a benefit in immunity... it's summer and school is out. So only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: norcal

customer_reviews.title: Great effective and tasty gummies
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I really love these gummies, and my husband is not a vitamin guy. The taste is good and the ingredients are great and work well to boost your immune system and protect you during cold and flu season.
customer_reviews.author: aduncan06

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I was purchasing a locally-made elderberry syrup and my kids hated the taste...so much so I didn’t even tell them these were elderberry vitamins or I knew they’d never try them. They gobble these right up, without even reminding them to take them. Great product! Flavor is raspberry but a slightly tart raspberry, not overly sweet, if that helps anyone. My daughter forgot to take them for about a week and caught a cold. We started taking the vitamins again and not only did the rest of us stay healthy and avoid catching her cold but her cold symptoms were mild and short-lived.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: I have an immunocompromised son who gets sick very easily and can also go downhill very quickly with any illness and these gummies have been AMAZING!!! We were using another elderberry gummy but I didn't see a huge difference so we switched to these and they have been a game changer! We all take them now and my son hasn't come down with anything since we started them and actually was coming down with something when I first started him on them and he never got very bad and was fully recovered within a couple days, highly recommend especially during cold/flu season!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Good for traveling
customer_reviews.text: We make our own Elderberry syrup but we went on a trip and couldn’t take it so I ordered these. They taste great but are SO high in sugar 😭. Worked for the time we needed it but definitely not a normal thing!
customer_reviews.author: jcofield91

customer_reviews.title: Funny taste
customer_reviews.text: These tasted like beer to me. I’ve tried other gummies that are way more tasty, these ones just tasted sour and herbal and honestly like a COORS light. Wanted to love but won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Like candy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take for on the go. You may think it is a sweet treat
customer_reviews.author: Ms Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: I have even eating elderberry gummies for years. These taste really good and are a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Received a opened or a returned bottle.  Be Leary and check your bottle’s seal
customer_reviews.text: No happy that bottle came tampered with. Inside seal had been opened. Be Leary and check inner seal before using!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved gummy
customer_reviews.text: I like that they’re not super gummy and easy to chew. My kids don’t give me a hard time about taking these like other brands we’ve tried, so that’s definitely a plus in my book. I have 3 children ranging in age, from schoolager, preschooler and toddler, so they are always in contact with germs so anything I can do to lessen sickness in our home, I’m willing to try. My husband will actually take these too. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kedre

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 18 year old who will take every supplement I give him if it’s in gummy form. Lol He’s a parkour coach and around lots of little ones and he hasn’t caught anything yet this season. I believe in giving the body boosts as much as possible during flu season. These are perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I waited about 2 weeks for these to be disappointed when opened a hole in the center!
customer_reviews.author: Jerrie Stephens

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I’m immunocompromised so I constantly worry about getting sick. I took these regularly before, during, and after a cruise to the Bahamas and never got sick. That’s unheard of for me. Since then, my husband and I take this supplement daily. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Elderberry Gummies with Vitaminc C, Propolis, Echinacea. Max Strength 200MG - Sambucus Immune Support for Adults & Kids | Raspberry - 70 Count
feature_bullets: 70 CHEWABLE CHILD & ADULT GUMMIES - These BeLive elderberry gummies for kids and adults provide a natural source of vitamins, powerful antioxidant & anti-inflammatory compounds to strengthen immune system.

WITH THE ADDED BENEFITS OF PROPOLIS, ECHINACEA & VITAMIN C – We’ve added pure Echinacea, Propolis, & Vitamin C, all effective in boosting the immune system to our adult and kids’ elderberry gummies to make them even better for you.

RASPBERRY FLAVOR - The easy way to take a daily dose of prevention and goodness, our elderberry supplement is suitable for everyone and has a delicious natural raspberry flavor with no artificial colors or additives.

VEGETARIAN NUTRITIONAL SUPPLEMENT – BeLive does not use gelatin or any animal products in the making of our sambucus elderberry gummies, and all of our dietary supplements are made in a kosher & halal certified facility.
GLUTEN FREE & VEGAN FRIENDLY – Made in an GMP approved facility.
